body:
Hi Axel,


I guess the rest of us missed the message you're referring to, so  
maybe this was posted to the group by mistake...


The false color feature of Photosphere is new, thanks to the generous  
support of the Lawrence Berkeley Laboratory, under a contract with  
NYSERDA for the New York Times.  You need to download the latest  
version from www.anyhere.com and find it in the "View" menu.


-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2006-January/003213.html).</sup>
